mapper.select: select project_title p , dep_name p , category p from project p join pro_member pm on (p.project_no = pm.project_no) where pm.user_no = #{userMemNo}
select count(*) from pro_board where status = 'Y'

select pb.pro_board_no , pb.pro_board_status , pb.pro_board_level , pb.pro_title , m.user_name as "pbUserName" , m.job_name as "pbJobName" , pb.create_date , pb.modify_date , pb.start_date , pb.end_date from pro_board pb join member m on (m.user_no = pb.user_no) where pb.project_no = 8 order by pb.pro_board_no desc
mapper.update: update pro_board set count = count+1 where pro_board_no = #{proBoardNo} and status = 'Y'
mapper.select: select pb.pro_board_no , pb.pro_title , pb.pro_board_status , m.user_name as "pbUserName" , m.job_name as "pbJobName" , pb.start_date , pb.end_date , pb.pro_board_level , pb.attach_path , pb.pro_content , count from pro_board pb join member m on (m.user_no = pb.user_no) where pb.pro_board_no = #{proBoardNo}
mapper.insert: insert into pro_board ( pro_board_no , project_no , user_no , pro_board_status , create_date , modify_date , start_date , end_date , pro_board_level , status , attach_path , attach_origin , attach_modify , pro_title , pro_content ) values ( seq_pro_board.nextval , #{projectNo} , #{boardWriterNo} , #{proBoardStatus} , sysdate , sysdate , to_char(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "startDate" , to_char(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "endDate" , #{proBoardLevel} , 'Y' , #{attachPath} , #{attchOrigin} , #{attachModify} , #{proTitle} , #{proContent} )
mapper.select: select pr.pro_reply_no , m.user_name , m.job_name , to_char(pr.create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "rCreateDate" , to_char(pr.modify_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "rModifyDate" , pr.pro_reply from pro_reply pr join member m on (pr.user_no = m.user_no) join pro_board pb on (pr.pro_board_no = pb.pro_board_no) where pb.pro_board_no = #{proBoardNo} order by pro_reply_no desc
